# Banner Image

Create a banner image (800x400px) with:
- Background: Dark gradient (#0a0a0f to #12121a)
- Logo: Audio waveform icon
- Text: "SoundForge AI" in gradient (cyan to purple)
- Subtitle: "12 Professional AI Audio Engines"

Tools to create:
- Canva.com
- Figma
- Photoshop
- Or use: https://via.placeholder.com/800x400/0a0a0f/00d9ff?text=SoundForge+AI

Save as `.github/banner.png`
